cast.name: 奥尔佳·奥尼申科 Olga Onishchenko
达丽娅·谢苗诺娃 Darya Semyonova

awards:
第25届俄罗斯尼卡奖(2012)
　　最佳女配角(提名) Evgeniya Dobrovolskaya

writer.name: 弗拉基米尔·考特 Vladimir Kott

director.name: 弗拉基米尔·考特 Vladimir Kott

introduction: In present day Moscow three childhood friends in their forties – former school band players – live their everyday lives of a police officer, a taxi driver and a surgeon. They have lost track of each other. Three stories of betrayal, love and ageing are told in parallel. In fact, unknown to our heroes, their paths cross and their lives become connected. But they are not aware of it even when they reunite for a breaking performance at their graduation anniversary.
